com.github.ykiselev.binary.format

Class Types

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ykiselev.binary.format.Types

  • public final class Types
extends Object
    Each serialized property is stored as a pair of header and data. Where header has size of one byte and data can vary from zero to N bytes. Header consist of two parts - lower four bits encode property type (see below) and higher four bits encode element type for arrays.

    Created by Y.Kiselev on 26.06.2016.
